The walk to the rock is one of my local neighborhood favorites. On a clear day, you can see the entire east bay, city and Marin. lovely.

A good place to go climbing. You can boulder and top-rope. The views are great too. Not that many routes, and pretty low key, but a good place to practice.

I love go all the up to the rock and just sit and relax there, you can see pretty far from there also if you catch sunset, it is beautiful.
